price: O my people, the life of this world is only a brief enjoyment, whereas the Hereafter is the permanent abode.
arabic: يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنَّمَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَتَٰعٞ وَإِنَّ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ هِيَ دَارُ ٱلۡقَرَارِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
